text: Roku ( ) is a digital media players brand manufactured by American company Roku, Inc.. It allows streaming of videos. It also have its own channel called Roku Channel. On August 8, 2018, The Roku Channel became available on the web as well. Roku also added the "Featured Free" section in which users can get access to direct streaming of shows and movies from its partners. ==References== Category:2008 establishments in the United States Category:Television
title: Roku
